properties.label: Swagger Path
properties.name: swagger.path
properties.tooltip: Provide path for swagger file to generate controller and model

properties.label: Java Package

properties.tooltip: provide java package name eg. com.amex.sidh, which will be part of generated java package

properties.tooltip: Mention port for application deployment, Port will be picked dynamically in case not mentioned

properties.label: Branch
properties.name: git.branch
properties.tooltip: Provide branch name eg. master

properties.label: Application Group Id
properties.name: application.groupId
properties.tooltip: Provide maven group id for parent project

properties.label: Application Version
properties.name: application.version
properties.tooltip: Provide maven version for parent project

properties.label: Update Existing Project?
properties.name: update
properties.tooltip: Enable, if you want to update existing project

properties.label: Service Mesh Type
properties.name: apiDeployHostEnvironment
properties.tooltip: Enable either netflix or istio configuration on generated code

properties.label: Enable Cloud Stream?
properties.name: cloudStream
properties.tooltip: Enable, if you want to generate cloud stream project

properties.label: Service Discovery
properties.name: service.discovery
properties.tooltip: Provide Service Discovery parent project

properties.label: Application Tracing
properties.name: application.tracing
properties.tooltip: Provide application tracing for parent project

properties.label: Application logging type
properties.name: application.logging
properties.tooltip: Provide logging type for parent project

properties.label: Log Aggregation implementation
properties.name: logAggregation.impl
properties.tooltip: Provide log aggr implemenation for parent project

properties.label: Linger (milliseconds)
properties.name: linger-ms
properties.tooltip: Wait time in ms for load optimization

properties.label: Buffer Memory
properties.name: buffer-memory
properties.tooltip: Memory use by producer to buffer records to be sent to the broker

properties.label: Batch Size
properties.name: batch-size
properties.tooltip: Specify size for kafka producer configuration

properties.label: Maximum Inflight Requests Per Connection
properties.name: max-in-flight-req-per-conn
properties.tooltip: Maximum number of unacknowledged requests the client, on a single connection before blocking

properties.label: Acknowledgement
properties.name: acks
properties.tooltip: Provide 1 or 0 for acknowledgement flag

properties.label: Bootstrap Server
properties.name: bootstrapServer
properties.tooltip: Leave blank to use pre-configured bootstrap server URL from config-server

properties.label: Trust-store location
properties.name: sslTruststoreLocation
properties.tooltip: Location of truststore jks file

properties.label: Trust-store password
properties.name: sslTruststorePassword
properties.tooltip: Password of truststore jks file

properties.label: JAAS username
properties.name: saslJaasUsername
properties.tooltip: Token in case of IBM Event Streams

properties.label: JAAS password
properties.name: saslJaasPassword
properties.tooltip: API Key in case IBM Event Streams

properties.label: Enable Monitoring?
properties.name: grafana.enabled
properties.tooltip: Enable/Disable Grafana monitoring

properties.label: Enable Deployment?
properties.name: deployment.enabled
properties.tooltip: Enable/Disable Deployment option

properties.label: api Deploy Environments
properties.name: apiDeployEnvironments
properties.tooltip: Select deployment environment

properties.label: api Deploy Type
properties.name: apiDeployType
properties.tooltip: Provide Deployment type i.e. cn or cfs

properties.label: api Deploy Default Environment
properties.name: apiDeployDefaultEnvironment
properties.tooltip: It will auto select, when you select an API Deployment Environment

properties.label: Config Repo
properties.name: apiDeployConfigRepo
properties.tooltip: Config repository details

properties.label: Config Repo Url
properties.name: apiDeployConfigRepoUrl
properties.tooltip: Config repository URL

properties.label: Deployment execution Step
properties.name: deploymentExecutionStep
properties.tooltip: Define jenkins pipeline execution stage i.e. build or deploy

properties.name: kapplication.name
properties.tooltip: Provide project name for kafka adapter

properties.name: kapplication.package
properties.tooltip: Provide java package name i.e. com.amex.sidh, which will be part of generated java package

properties.name: kmonitor.path
properties.tooltip: These are pre-exposed actuator endpoints

properties.tooltip: Provide project name for rest adapter

properties.tooltip: Provide java package name i.e. com.amex.sidh, which will be part of generated java package
